title: Why did Hunter x Hunter stop? - Quora

response.answer_text: Many still quote the back pain problem of Yoshihiro Togashi(Mangaka) being the reason. Togashi did say his back pain is from bad posture when he was gaming.(And from his own drawings, he didn’t seem to be correcting it even after it became such a hinder to his work.) While he had assistants before(One actually published a manga about his assistancehood during the Yu Yu Hakusho period), he is also very against the idea of using assistants, so that didn’t really help in his excuses.(Some of the newer chapters he seemed to have his wife as his assistant) Also, he is not really blaming his hiatus on his back pain(at least not any more). In 2018 he claimed that he has issues with the heavy tax rates: 超血汗！所得被抽走70%　難怪冨樫要當休刊王 and is very frustrated that if he worked 20 hours a day, 14 hours of it is taken away. (The page is in Chinese, but the second image is a photo of the comment in Japanese, copied from the 50th anniversary special of Jump) People have speculated that the 70% tax he claimed cannot be correct(the highest rate is 45%. But since he is saying 70% of his work output is not received by him after tax, he may also be saying a lot of it is taken by the publishing company.(but he obviously don’t want to offend the company so he blame it on tax instead) He really couldn’t care less about money since other than his own earnings(even if he stop working, the sales of previous works), his wife’s earnings(His wife is the author of Sailor Moon in case you don’t know) are still creating a large inflow of income for their family of 4. Also, Naoko Takeuchi(his wife, now technically Naoko Togashi but she didn’t change her name in many registers and people are still referring to her with her maiden name) is from a VERY rich family running a jewellery business to begin with. Some say that he is a perfectionist and keep scrapping ideas and redoing them, thus given the chance and freedom(The publisher is no longer chasing him down for new chapters) he tends to keep improving his work. So is it laziness that got him into the hiatus? Maybe. But it is obvious that there are many layers to this story, laziness is only a combination of frustration of high taxes and loyalty fees paid to the company, family life, perfectionist ideals, no immediate need of bread making for income and maybe slightly because of back pain. Everything points to “no outcome” even if he did worked on the story.

If you want to be technical. It didnt end The creator of Hunter x Hunter Yoshihiro Togashi is on hiatus. For two years. After multiple years. Now here look at this image of his “Hiatus chart” if you will  He says he has back pain which is why he is on Hiatus so much and he also says the manga company is putting to much stress on him. If you wanted my opinion I call cap. You see my mom has had back problems so do you know what she did? She had surgery and we’re by no means rich but Togashi is RICH he could fix his back anytime he wants I doubt it’s just his back. He also says it’s stress which it could be everyone handles stress differently but he’s not handling it good he could just end the manga right here and i’ll be more happy instead of having everyone wait here THE MANGA CAME OUT IN 1998 AND HE’S ONLY IN CHAPTER 390 HE’S TAKEN ALMOST TWO YEARS OFF. You know what shows came out and ended by that time? Tokyo ghoul 143 chapters, Attack on titan 132 IT COMES OUT MONTHLY and each chapter is like 2 chapters for god sake(Yes I know it didnt end yet but its close to), NARUTO CAME OUT AFTER HUNTER X HUNTER IT HAS 700 CHAPTERS WEEKLY FOR GOD SAKE BLEACH ENDED(The anime) AND THE MANGA IS AT CHAPTER 686 BOTH OF THESE SHOWS MAIN CHARACTERS HAVE KIDS NOW?!?!. These are (Mostly) Weekly mangas that started after hunter x hunter and are either still going or finished and have more chapters than hunter x hunter. Personally I just think Togashi isnt interested into writing the manga. I mean just think about it the dude’s net worth is estimated to me 25 MILLION ?! He has no obligation to keep working he’s set for life and I doubt he’ll ever finish Hunter x Hunter. So now you’re probably asking? Why doesnt he just give the manga to someone else like Akira Toriyama or do it once a month a page a day isnt very much. To answer you I have NO CLUE. He has said that he’ll “Finish the manga or die” which it looks like he’ll die before it finishes (Not trying to be rude) Because he still has A LOT to cover. He’s still in the dark continent expedition arc WE’RE NOT EVEN THERE YET we’ve been in this ark SINCE 2012 MY GUY THIS SHOW IS OLDER THAN ME AND I’M ALREADY OLDER THAN THE MAIN CHARACTER WHY. I know i’m sounding really rude right now as he has no obligation to actually continue this series but he has many options instead of leading on thousands of fans like fixing your issues. If he has back problems there are many solutions. For his stress I doubt he’s having stress he’s had 2 years off and multiple months after months off. He could again just give the manga to someone else at this point I’d rather him just give the story to an experienced story teller than just leave us hanging. Oh yea and just for reference this is Eiichiro Odas Hiatus chart  It only goes up past 2018 but he’s been pretty consist with manga only taking 1 break per month for only a week because he does it EVERY WEEK and every manga chapter still has as much detail as manga chapter 1 AND I CANT EVEN FIND AKIRA TORIYAMA BECAUSE THE MAN WAS A LEGEND
